thread.section_title: The Logo Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Company | thelogocompany.net
thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: The Logo Company reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: As an entrepreneurial healthcare professional, I have used several "logo" companies in the past, some well known. The Logo Company is the best by far! They offered numerous stimulating introductory samples. And remained patient through my numerous revisions. This company exudes experience, creativity and much needed patience, for an artistically challenged business owner. I have already recommended them to colleagues and will definitely use The Logo Company in the future. Thanks guys.
